<h2>Security</h2>
<em>Keeping systems, identities, and content safe</em>
<p>The 'Security' competency is made up of the following skills:</p>
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/Security/detecting-online-scams Detecting online scams and 'phishing' by employing recognized tools and techniques]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/Security/encrypting-data Encrypting data and communications using software and add-ons]
* [https://wiki.mozilla.org/Learning/WebLiteracyStandard/Exploring/Security/changing-default-behavior Changing the default behavior of websites, add-ons and extensions to make Web browsing more secure]
